name: Deepsight
text: Your senses are especially keen in the utter darkness.
benefit: Your darkvision has a range of 120 feet.
mythicText: Your sharp eyes can penetrate deeper into the darkness, revealing more to you.
mythicBenefit: The range of your darkvision increases by 10 feet per tier.
text_zh: 你的感官在完全的黑暗中格外敏锐。
benefit_zh: 你的黑暗视觉提升至120尺。
normal_zh: 黑暗视觉通常只有60尺或90尺。
mythicText_zh: 你那敏锐的双眸能够看透深幽的黑暗，传达给你更多信息。
mythicBenefit_zh: 你的黑暗视觉增加每阶层10尺。
